name: dragon-scale
effect: Held by Seadra: Evolves the holder into Kingdra when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Seadra: Holder evolves into Kingdra.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A strange scale held by DRAGON- type POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: A strange scale held by DRAGON- type POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A thick and tough scale. A DRAGON-type POKéMON may be holding it.
